title: Create a Customer Survey Questionnaire
description: To gather customer feedback for a client, an agent must create a survey questionnaire.

tasks.description: Based on the project goal ('understand drivers of customer churn'), define key areas for the survey (e.g., 'Product Quality', 'Customer Service', 'Price').
For each area, draft 3-5 questions using a mix of question types (e.g., multiple choice, Likert scale, open-ended).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of well-formed and relevant survey questions.

tasks.description: Assemble the questions into a logical survey flow, starting with simple questions and ending with open-ended ones.
